text:
This virus is hitting out community hard. 
Working from home is almost a revolution in the VFX industry. 
Not too much of a personal question really. I’ve worked  on quite a few of the Harry Potter Films and all the Fantastic Beasts. Plus a few of the Chris Nolan films such as The Batman Films and Inception.  And there’s plenty  of others but I think I enjoy working on the Wizarding films the most, much more my kind of films.
I loved the original Harry Potter films but these new fantastic beasts ones are just rubbing me the wrong way. Fantasy is tied for my favourite genre
I'm assuming the majority of the big budget film production that gets done in Britain is down in London?
Also, which 3D software do you see most in the industry? My uni uses Maya but I know most independent 3D artists use Blender
